      static Cryptography doDecryptObject(byte[] password, String path, byte[] salt)

      Decrypt a serializable object in 128 bit AES using a PBKDF2 with SHA1 key, uses standard 128 bit length key size and deserialize an object through path

      Object must implement Serializable to work

      We suggest to use a generated serial version ID

      Get info on Advanced Encryption Standard (AES): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard

      Get info on serialization: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serialization


      static void doEncryptObject(byte[] password, String path, Serializable obj, byte[] salt)

      Encrypt a serializable object in 128 bit AES using a PBKDF2 with SHA1 key, uses standard 128 bit length key size and serialize an object

      Object must implement Serializable to work

      We suggest to use a generated serial version ID

      Get info on Advanced Encryption Standard (AES): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard

      Get info on serialization: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serialization

      • doEncryptObject

        public static void doEncryptObject(byte[] password,
                                   String path,
                                   Serializable obj,
                                   byte[] salt)
                            throws InvalidKeyException,
                                   BadPaddingException,
                                   ClassNotFoundException,
                                   IOException,
                                   NullSaltException

        Encrypt a serializable object in 128 bit AES using a PBKDF2 with SHA1 key, uses standard 128 bit length key size and serialize an object

        Object must implement Serializable to work

        We suggest to use a generated serial version ID

        Get info on Advanced Encryption Standard (AES): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard

        Get info on serialization: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serialization


        Parameters:
        password -
        path -
        object - to encrypt
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException
        BadPaddingException
        ClassNotFoundException
        IOException
        NullSaltException

      • doDecryptObject

        public static Cryptography doDecryptObject(byte[] password,
                                           String path,
                                           byte[] salt)
                                    throws InvalidKeyException,
                                           BadPaddingException,
                                           ClassNotFoundException,
                                           IOException,
                                           NullSaltException

        Decrypt a serializable object in 128 bit AES using a PBKDF2 with SHA1 key, uses standard 128 bit length key size and deserialize an object through path

        Object must implement Serializable to work

        We suggest to use a generated serial version ID

        Get info on Advanced Encryption Standard (AES): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard

        Get info on serialization: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serialization


        Parameters:
        password -
        path -
        Returns:
        a Cryptography object
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException
        BadPaddingException
        ClassNotFoundException
        IOException
        NullSaltException
